name: Quest of Candles
description:
Today is the Queen's birthday, but there's a problem - the magic candles, which are crucial for the celebrations, are missing! An imp has hidden them somewhere in the city, and it's up to you to find them. You'll need to explore every nook and cranny to locate these candles before it's too late. But beware, the imp has set up many challenges and obstacles to stop you in your tracks. Do you think you have what it takes to save the day? Play now and find out!

P.S. Happy Birthday Lady Lyons

Controls:

Move - WSAD

Look - Mouse

Jump - Space

AltF4 - Quit
